attributes.background:
Hairdressers can open even though they cannot social distance, they are in close touch with their customers, however gyms where social distancing can be maintained still can't open. What is a logic in this?
We can open safely, let us do it!

rejection.details: Since you started your petition gyms have been allowed to reopen. You can read the Government's announcement about the reopening of gyms here: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/government-announces-gyms-and-pools-to-reopen-safely
